支.definition: to support; to sustain; to erect; to raise; branch; division; to draw money; classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions

支付不起.definition: to be unable to pay; unaffordable

支付得起.definition: to be able to pay; affordable

支使.definition: to order (sb) around; to send on an errand; to send away

支光.definition: watt, unit of power used for electric bulbs

支出.definition: to spend; to pay out; expenses; expenditure

支吾.definition: to respond evasively or vaguely; to elude; to stall

支吾其詞.definition: (idiom) to talk in a roundabout way to cover up the truth; evasive

支子.definition: support; stand; trivet; (cooking utensil) gridiron; (variant of 梔子|栀子[zhi1 zi5]) cape jasmine

支恐.definition: to support terrorism; abbr. for 支持恐怖主義|支持恐怖主义[zhi1 chi2 kong3 bu4 zhu3 yi4]

支應.definition: to deal with; to wait on; to provide for

支承.definition: to support; to bear the weight of (a building)

支招.definition: to give advice; to make a suggestion; to help out

支持.definition: to be in favor of; to support; to back; support; backing; to stand by; CL:個|个[ge4]

支援.definition: to provide assistance; to support; to back

支撐.definition: to prop up; to support; strut; brace

支支吾吾.definition: to hem and haw; to stall; to stammer; to mumble; to falter

支教.definition: program bringing education to underdeveloped areas; to work in such a program

支書.definition: branch secretary; secretary of a branch of the Communist Party or the Communist Youth League; abbr. for 支部書記|支部书记

支架.definition: trestle; support; stand; frame; (medicine) stent; to prop up; to resist; to withstand (an enemy attack etc)

支系.definition: branch or subdivision of a family

支線.definition: branch line; side road; spur; fig. secondary plot (in a story)

支與流裔.definition: lit. branches and descendants; of a similar kind; related

支走.definition: to send sb away (with an excuse)

支邊.definition: to help develop the border areas

支那.definition: phonetic transcription of China (Japanese: Shina), colonial term, generally considered discriminatory

支部.definition: branch, esp. grass root branches of a political party

支配.definition: to control; to dominate; to allocate

支開.definition: to send (sb) away; to change the subject; to open (an umbrella etc)
